agents.name: Cost Estimation Agent
agents.description: Performs valuation prediction based on building type, region, and cost matrix

agents.name: Data Quality Agent
agents.description: Scans dataset for missing or invalid fields and reports anomalies

agents.name: Geospatial Analysis Agent
agents.description: Validates spatial data for parcels and overlays valuation deltas

agents.name: Document Processing Agent
agents.description: Extracts and summarizes building data from scanned PDFs or documents

agents.name: Inquisitor Agent
agents.description: Validates matrix structure and expected fields

agents.name: Interpreter Agent
agents.description: Parses Excel file into JSON matrix representation

agents.name: Legacy Data Quality Agent
agents.description: Legacy agent for data quality checks
